testCaseResult.testCaseName: Repository relationship reference copy lifecycle test case
successfulAssertions: repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-00: UsedInContext relationship type definition matches known type
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-01: UsedInContext reference relationship created; repository supports storage of reference copies.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-02: UsedInContext reference relationship can be retrieved as Relationship.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-03: UsedInContext reference relationship matches the relationship that was saved.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: UsedInContext reference relationship status cannot be updated.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-04: UsedInContext reference relationship status cannot be updated.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-05: UsedInContext reference relationship properties cannot be updated.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-06: UsedInContext reference relationship type cannot be changed.
repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle-07: UsedInContext reference relationship identity cannot be changed.
repository-test-case-base-01: Repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
repository-test-case-base-02: Metadata collection for repository connector supplied to conformance suite.
unsuccessfulAssertions: Unexpected Exception Exception : CTS test repository-relationship-reference-copy-lifecycle caught exception FunctionNotSupportedException from method purgeRelationshipReferenceCopy whilst trying to purge a reference copy of a relationship of type UsedInContext.
